    • Method Detail

      • isExternalRegistryQueryable

        boolean isExternalRegistryQueryable(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                    throws TeamRepositoryException
        Answer whether the external user registry is queryable by the application. It is possible that deployment is using a custom module in the application server for authentication. If so the Jazz application will not be able to query the registry. If the external registry is not queryable, then the application is responsible for maintaining all attributes of IContributor contributors in the system.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • isExternalRegistryWriteable

        boolean isExternalRegistryWriteable(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                    throws TeamRepositoryException
        Answer whether the external user registry allows write backs from the application. It is possible that deployment is using a custom module in the application server for authentication, or they have a read-only LDAP registry. If so the Jazz application will not be able to write to the registry. If the external registry is not writable, then modifications must be made outside of this application.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • listAllReadOnlyAttributes

        java.lang.String[] listAllReadOnlyAttributes(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                             throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns the list of contributor attribute names that cannot be modified. Some user attributes will be mapped to attributes in the external registry (e.g., userid, name, etc), and those attributes cannot be modified by the application.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • listApplicationGroups

        IExternalGroup[] listApplicationGroups(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                       throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns a list of all the group (role) names that are used by the Jazz application for authentication and permissions
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • getGroupDescription

        java.lang.String getGroupDescription(java.lang.String groupName,
                                   org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                     throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get the description of a group
        Parameters:
        groupName -
        Returns:
        the description of the group
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • fetchUser

        IExternalUser fetchUser(java.lang.String userId,
                      org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                        throws TeamRepositoryException
        Query the external registry, and return an associated external user, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        userId - the userId of the contributor or user to be fetched; must not be null
        Returns:
        IExternalUser the external user, if found. Never null.
        Throws:
        UnknownUserException - if a user does not exist in the external registry.
        PermissionDeniedException - if the currently authenticated user does not have authority IPermissionService.JAZZ_ADMINS to access the external registry
        TeamRepositoryException - for anything else.

      • fetchGroupsForUser

        java.lang.String[] fetchGroupsForUser(java.lang.String userId,
                                    org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                      throws TeamRepositoryException
        Queries the registry to determine which of the known application groups a user is a member of. Typical use of this method is to find the system permissions associated with the user. This will not include any groups not known by the Jazz application.
        Parameters:
        userId - User id of the contributor
        Returns:
        An array of group names
        Throws:
        PermissionDeniedException - if the currently authenticated user does not have authority IPermissionService.JAZZ_ADMINS to access the external registry
        TeamRepositoryException - for anything else.
        See Also:
        #listApplicationGroups()

      • isMember

        boolean isMember(java.lang.String userId,
               java.lang.String groupName,
               org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                 throws TeamRepositoryException
        Is user a member of the given group name?
        Parameters:
        userId - User Id
        groupName - Group Name
        Throws:
        PermissionDeniedException - if the currently authenticated user does not have authority IPermissionService.JAZZ_ADMINS to access the external registry
        TeamRepositoryException - for anything else.

      • findUsersByName

        IExternalUser[] findUsersByName(java.lang.String name,
                              org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                throws TeamRepositoryException
        Find all users matching the provided query, where the full name starts with the parameter
        Parameters:
        name - the name to search, must not be null
        Returns:
        all users found; may be empty; never null
        Throws:
        PermissionDeniedException - if the currently authenticated user does not have authority IPermissionService.JAZZ_ADMINS to access the external registry
        TeamRepositoryException

      • findUsersByAnyName

        IExternalUser[] findUsersByAnyName(java.lang.String name,
                                 org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                   throws TeamRepositoryException
        Find all users matching the provided query, where the full name, aka common name, contains the string preceded by the well known name separator (usually a space). For example, a search string of "smi" would return a hit for "John A Smith".
        Parameters:
        name - the name to search, must not be null
        Returns:
        all users found; may be empty; never null
        Throws:
        PermissionDeniedException - if the currently authenticated user does not have authority IPermissionService.JAZZ_ADMINS to access the external registry
        TeamRepositoryException

      • getMaxLimitForUserSearchQuery

        int getMaxLimitForUserSearchQuery(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                  throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get the maximum number of entries returned from a user search query.
        Returns:
        maximum number of entries that will be returned from a user search query; -1 if there is no limit on the number of entries returned from a user search query.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • addExternalUser

        void addExternalUser(java.lang.String userId,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String emailAddress,
                   java.lang.String[] groups,
                   org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                     throws TeamRepositoryException
        Create a new user in the external user registry. The external user registry must be writable to create a new user.
        Parameters:
        userId - User id of the user to be created
        password - Password of the user
        name - Full name of the user
        emailAddress - Email address of the user
        groups - Groups user is member of
        Throws:
        UnmodifiableUserRegistryException - if write is not supported
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        PermissionDeniedException - if the currently authenticated user does not have authority IPermissionService.JAZZ_ADMINS to access the external registry
        See Also:
        #isExternalRegistryWriteable()

      • updateExternalUser

        void updateExternalUser(java.lang.String userId,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String emailAddress,
                      java.lang.String[] groups,
                      org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                        throws TeamRepositoryException
        Parameters:
        userId -
        name -
        emailAddress -
        groups -
        Throws:
        UnmodifiableUserRegistryException - if write is not supported
        PermissionDeniedException - if the currently authenticated user does not have authority IPermissionService.JAZZ_ADMINS to access the external registry
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        See Also:
        #isExternalRegistryWriteable()

        groupName -

      • changePassword

        void changePassword(java.lang.String userId,
                  java.lang.String oldPassword,
                  java.lang.String newPassword,
                  org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                    throws TeamRepositoryException
        Change the password for the named user. The user must be the currently authenticated contributor; you can only change your own password.
        Parameters:
        userId - - the userId of the user; must match the currently authenticated contributor
        oldPassword - - the old password
        newPassword - - the new password
        Throws:
        PermissionDeniedException - if the currently authenticated contributor is not the same as the user; or if the old password is incorrect
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • resetPassword

        void resetPassword(java.lang.String userId,
                 java.lang.String[] emailAddresses,
                 org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                   throws TeamRepositoryException
        Reset the password for the named user. Administrators can only request the password to be reset for the named user
        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the user whose password need to be reset; must not be null
        emailAddresses - Email Addresses of the user. The new password will be sent to the provided email addresses; must not be null
        monitor - Prgress monitor
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException
        UnmodifiableUserRegistryException - if write is not supported
        PermissionDeniedException - if the currently authenticated contributor is not an Admin
